mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.partner_type AS "partnerType", a.partner_name AS "partnerName", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.desk_phone AS "deskPhone", a.user_name AS "userName", a.bank_name AS "bankName", a.bank_account AS "bankAccount", a.commission_percent AS "commissionPercent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_partner( id, partner_type, partner_name, cell_phone, desk_phone, user_name, bank_name, bank_account, commission_percent, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{partnerType}, #{partnerName}, #{cellPhone}, #{deskPhone}, #{userName}, #{bankName}, #{bankAccount}, #{commissionPercent}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_partner SET partner_type = #{partnerType}, partner_name = #{partnerName}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone}, desk_phone = #{deskPhone}, user_name = #{userName}, bank_name = #{bankName}, bank_account = #{bankAccount}, commission_percent = #{commissionPercent}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
